data.title: Adobe Persuasion version 3.0
data.text:
Artifact Details

Title

Adobe Persuasion version 3.0

Catalog Number

102700801

Type

Software

Description

Contents: CD-ROM (2); 3 1/2 inch floppy disk (12); License agreement; Adobe Type Library brochure; User manual; Chart manual; Auto template guide; Adobe Person-to-Person Technical Support card; Registration card; The Adobe Dictionary Pack brochure; Adobe Persuasion 3.0 Clip Art booklet; Presentation Tips brochure.

Date

1995

Publisher

Adobe Systems

Version

3.0

System Requirements

Requirements: Apple Macintosh computer with a 68020 processor; Apple System Software version 7.0 or later; 4 MB of application RAM; 14 MB of free hard drive space; Recommendations: Apple Macintosh with a 68030 or greater processor, including Power Macintosh; 5 MB of application RAM; 33 MB of free hard drive space; CD-ROM driver (for CD Bonus Pack).

Format

3 1/2 inch floppy disk; CD-ROM

Collection Title

CHM packaged software collection

Series Title

Packaged software

Lot Number

X4657.2008
